Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I recently came across a mod which made the game harder by making kerbals need 'stuff' to survive. However now i can't find it so i was wondering if anyone new what i am talking about and could direct me to the mod.

cheers,

Toby
I've been looking for that too, if I find it ill send a link if you find it can you please send the link? Thanks!
You could look here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/?s=life+support&x=0&y=0, or just search at the spaceport for life support
